diff_hunk:
@@ -7,9 +7,9 @@
 #define const_storage_cast(storage) \
   dynamic_cast<const THStorage<real>&>(storage)
 #define const_long_cast(tensor) \
-  dynamic_cast<const THSTensor<long>&>(tensor)
+  dynamic_cast<const THSTensor<int64_t>&>(tensor)
body: I think this is inconsistent with the rest of the PR, which uses `longlong` for `int64_t`. Might be better to make it consistent, by changing the rest to be named after `long` instead of `longlong`?
body_html: I think this is inconsistent with the rest of the PR, which uses longlong for int64_t. Might be better to make it consistent, by changing the rest to be named after long instead of longlong?
body_text: I think this is inconsistent with the rest of the PR, which uses longlong for int64_t. Might be better to make it consistent, by changing the rest to be named after long instead of longlong?
